tools_section.metaDescription: The AI teaching assistant built for students at UIUC.
tools_section.visualEditor: beautiful visual workflow editor to create custom functions for your project.
tools_section.inviteOnly: Tool use via LLMs is invite-only to prevent abuse. Please shoot me an email for access: rohan13@illinois.edu
tools_section.createApiKey: Inside n8n, create an n8n API key and save it here.
tools_section.startWorkflow: Start by creating your first workflow on
tools_section.ensureTrigger: Ensure you have the correct trigger node for your workflow, check docs for details
tools_section.addNodes: Add the necessary nodes for your workflow
tools_section.makeActive: Make sure your workflow is active
tools_section.testWorkflow: Test your workflow to complete usage onboarding
tools_section.workflowCongrats: If your workflow is working as expected, Congrats! üöÄ
tools_section.usersCanUse: Your users can now start using it on the
tools_section.apiKeyDescription: We use this to run your workflows. You can find your n8n API Key in your n8n account settings.
tools_section.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter your n8n API Key here

error.title: Error
error.save_failed: Failed to save n8n API Key. Please try again later.

api.retrieval_only_tooltip: Retrieval Only bypasses the LLM call, making it free to retrieve relevant documents that match your prompt.
api.stateless_info: This API is stateless, meaning each request is independent of others. For multi-turn conversations, simply append new messages to the 'messages' array in the next call.
api.note_ncsa_models: NCSA hosted models like Qwen and Llama are hosted by NCSA and they are free!
api.note_gpt4o_mini: GPT-4o-mini offers the best price/performance ratio
api.note_llm_keys: UIUC.chat automatically manages LLM provider keys - just add them in the LLMs page.
api.note_rag_results: For getting only RAG results, set retrieval_only to true. This will not invoke the LLM.

auth.account_bug_message: You've encountered a software bug! Your account has no email address. Please shoot me an email so I can fix it for you:

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.details_placeholder: Share any additional details about your feedback

types.incomplete_request: Did not fully follow my request

homepage.no_projects_yet: You haven't created any projects yet. Let's

step1.heading: Bring your documents and tools
step1.desc1: Simply Drag-n-Drop your files for analysis.

step2.heading: Customize LLMs, prompts, and tools (optional)
step2.desc: Updated with the world's best AI models at your fingertips, enhanced with tools and advanced prompt engineering.

api.pitch: If you're tired of the OpenAI API and want an AI that's trained to understand your data, come build on our API with 52+ models to choose from. We're always updated with the latest State of the Art (SOTA) open source LLMs for free, hosted here at Illinois.

custom.industry_pitch: We build features for industry partners to bring GenAI to their org. Reach out at hi@uiuc.chat

flagship.dive_right_into_bots: Dive right into our bots trained on everything Illinois
flagship.its_the_easiest_way_to_make_your: It's the easiest way to make your

connect.title: Connect
connect.to_canvas_github_notion: to Canvas, GitHub, Notion and more.

share.for_whoever_you_want_to_use_it: for whoever you want to use it

about.ncsa_part_of: Part of the National Center for Supercomputing Applications.
about.started_by_rohan_marwaha: Started by Rohan Marwaha at the University of Illinois. But it

rebrand.announcement: Heads up: we've rebranded to Illinois Chat
rebrand.tooltip: We're on our way to becoming a production service for all U of I campuses.

documents.enabled_tooltip: If a document is included in ANY enabled group, it will be included in chatbot results. Enabled groups take precedence over disabled groups.

models.configure_llm_providers_title: Configure LLM Providers for your Chatbot
models.configure_llm_providers_subtitle: Choose which LLMs are available to your users. Enable or disable models to balance price and performance.
models.closed_source_description: The best performers, but you have to pay their prices and follow their rules.
models.default_model_helper: This model will be used by default for all new conversations. You can change the model for individual conversations in the chat interface.

fields.base_url_placeholder: Enter the base URL for your Ollama instance (e.g., http://localhost:11434)

ncsa_hosted.title: NCSA Hosted Models (100% free)
ncsa_hosted.description: The best free option is the Qwen 2 72B model, hosted by NCSA.

ollama.title: OpenAI Compatible via Ollama
ollama.description: Run various open-source models locally through Ollama. Supports models like Llama 2, Mistral, and more with OpenAI-compatible API.

webllm.title: On-device AI with WebLLM
webllm.description: We support running some models in your web browser on your device. That's 100% local, on-device AI. It even uses your GPU. For this, your browser must pass this compatability check for WebGPU.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.document_groups_description: Document Groups help you organize and control your documents. You can enable or disable specific document groups
dashboard.starting_url_web_scraping: The Starting URL of Web Scraping
dashboard.error_fetching_metadata: An error occurred while fetching course metadata. Please try again later.

upload.describe_project_placeholder: Describe your project, goals, expected impact etc...
upload.shown_before_first_chat: This message is shown before the first chat
upload.greeting_placeholder: Enter a greeting message for your users...
upload.users_try_example_questions: Users can try these example questions to get started
upload.logo_header_notice: This logo will appear in the header of your chatbot

prompt.title: Prompting
prompt.engineering_guide_intro: For additional insights and best practices on prompt creation, please review:
prompt.openai_guide: The Official OpenAI Prompt Engineering Guide
prompt.link_settings_intro: Configure AI behavior settings for your shareable link. These settings will enable specific behaviors when users access the chat through this link. Note: If a setting is enabled course-wide, enabling it here will ensure it stays active even if course-wide settings change in the future.
prompt.guided_learning_locked_tooltip: This setting is currently enabled course-wide. Enabling it here will ensure it stays active even if course settings change.
prompt.guided_learning_link_tooltip: Enable guided learning mode for this link. The AI will encourage independent problem-solving by providing hints and questions instead of direct answers.
prompt.document_only_locked_tooltip: This setting is currently enabled course-wide. Enabling it here will ensure it stays active even if course settings change.
prompt.document_only_link_tooltip: Restrict AI to only use information from provided documents. The AI will not use external knowledge or make assumptions beyond the documents' content.
prompt.bypass_internal_prompting_locked_tooltip: This setting is currently enabled course-wide. Enabling it here will ensure it stays active even if course settings change.
prompt.bypass_internal_prompting_link_tooltip: Use raw system prompt without additional internal prompting. This bypasses UIUC.chat's built-in prompts for citations and helpfulness.

alerts.optimize_failed: Failed to optimize prompt. Please try again.
alerts.copy_default_success: Default post-prompt system prompt copied to clipboard
alerts.copy_default_error: Could not copy text to clipboard

toast.error_updating_message: An error occurred while updating the prompt. Please try again.
toast.reset_message: The system prompt has been reset to default settings.
toast.updated_message: The system prompt has been updated.

research.title: Illinois Research Finder
research.tagline: Find professors based on your research interests
research.description: Using all of Illinois's documentation, get detailed examples, advice and information about the conference.

neurips2024.title: NeurIPS 2024
neurips2024.tagline: Trained on all 4,000+ papers from the largest AI conference in the world
neurips2024.description: Using all of NeurIPS 2024's documentation, get detailed examples, advice and information about the conference.

ncsadelta.title: NCSA Delta Supercomputer
ncsadelta.tagline: Quickstart on our Delta supercomputer, it'll write SLRUM scripts for you üòÅ
ncsadelta.description: Using all of Delta's documentation, get detailed examples, advice and information about how to use the Delta supercomputer.

analysis.metaDescription: The AI teaching assistant built for students at UIUC.
analysis.projectAnalyticsDesc: Overview of project engagement and usage statistics
analysis.selectTimeRange: Select a time range to filter the visualizations below
analysis.noConversationData: No conversation data available for selected time range
analysis.tryDifferentTimeRange: Try selecting a different time range to view the visualizations
analysis.aiModelsUsed: Distribution of AI models used across all conversations
analysis.showsTotalConversations: Shows the total number of conversations that occurred on each calendar day
analysis.viewConversationPatterns: View conversation patterns by hour of day or day of week
analysis.heatmapConversationDensity: A heatmap showing conversation density across both days and hours
analysis.toggleLinearLog: Toggle between linear and logarithmic scale
analysis.switchLinearLog: Switch between linear and logarithmic scale visualization
analysis.conceptMapDescription: The Concept Map visualizes all queries made in this project:
analysis.visualizationNote: Note you are unable to login or edit this map. It's for your visualization only. Please
analysis.notEnoughDataBody: We need at least 20 questions to generate a meaningful visualization of how topics relate to each other. Please ask more questions and check back later!

alerts.error_deleting_file_message: There was an error deleting the file. Please try again.
alerts.file_deleting_bg: The file is being deleted in the background.

update_success.title: Updated LLM providers
update_success.message: Now your project's users can use the supplied LLMs!

update_error.title: Error updating LLM providers
update_error.message: Failed to update LLM providers. Please try again later.

fetch_error.title: Error
fetch_error.message: Failed to fetch your API keys. Our database must be having a bad day. Please refresh or try again later.

alerts.web_scrape_message: We have begun crawling your site. You will receive updates when content is ready.

web_scrape_refresh_notice: You can refresh the page after a minute to see the new content appear in your Documents table.
max_urls_tooltip: The maximum number of URLs that will be crawled and processed. Higher numbers mean more content but longer processing time.

example_questions.example_question_placeholder: Enter an example question that users can try...

upload_cards.website_description: Import content from any website by providing the URL. Supports recursive crawling with customizable depth.
upload_cards.github_description: Import content from GitHub repositories, including documentation, code, and README files.
upload_cards.mit_course_description: Import content from MIT OpenCourseWare, including lecture notes, assignments, and course materials.
upload_cards.coursera_description: Import content from Coursera courses, including lectures, assignments, and course materials.

website_ingest.max_urls_tooltip: The maximum number of URLs that will be crawled and processed. Higher numbers mean more content but longer processing time.
website_ingest.equal_and_below_desc: Only crawl pages at or below the current URL path
website_ingest.same_subdomain_desc: Crawl all pages on the same subdomain
website_ingest.entire_domain_desc: Crawl all pages on the same domain and its subdomains
website_ingest.all_desc: Crawl all linked pages regardless of domain
website_ingest.suggest_equal_and_below: We suggest starting with Equal and Below
website_ingest.rerun_if_needed: and rerunning if you need more content

github_ingest.we_will_ingest_all_files: We will ingest all files in the main branch

canvas_ingest.title: Canvas
canvas_ingest.description: Import content from your Canvas course, including files, pages, modules, syllabus, assignments, and discussions.
canvas_ingest.permission_instructions: Before proceeding, you MUST add the UIUC Chatbot as a student to your Canvas course at
canvas_ingest.permission_note: This is required for access to any of your Canvas content. The AI can only see what students/TAs have access to.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.hint: Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

details.title: More details about the AI models

ncsa_hosted.title: NCSA Hosted Models (100% free)
ncsa_hosted.description: The best free option is the Qwen 2 72B model, hosted by NCSA.

ncsa_hosted_vlm.title: NCSA Hosted Vision Models (100% free)
ncsa_hosted_vlm.description: Access NCSA's vision-language models for multimodal tasks.

openai.title: OpenAI
openai.description: OpenAI model details and pricing. An OpenAI API key is required, and you may face rate-limit issues until you complete your first billing cycle.

azure.title: Azure OpenAI
azure.description: Azure OpenAI Service provides enterprise-grade security and regional availability. Check out Azure OpenAI models for details on available models and features.

anthropic.title: Anthropic
anthropic.description: Access Claude models through Anthropic's API. Claude excels at complex reasoning and analysis tasks.

ollama.title: OpenAI Compatible via Ollama
ollama.description: Run various open-source models locally through Ollama. Supports models like Llama 2, Mistral, and more with OpenAI-compatible API.

webllm.title: On-device AI with WebLLM
webllm.description: We support running some models in your web browser on your device. That's 100% local, on-device AI. It even uses your GPU. For this, your browser must pass this compatability check for WebGPU.
webllm.working: If you see lots of text, it's working. If you see "webgpu not available on this browser", it's not working.

dashboard_page.title: My Chatbots
dashboard_page.description: These are chatbots you've created, or where you are an admin.

navbar.course_logo_aria: The course creator uploaded a logo for this chatbot.
